org.wmn4j.notation.elements

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeySignature

        public KeySignature(List<Pitch.Base> sharps,
                    List<Pitch.Base> flats)
        Constructor for KeySignature. For common key signatures use the ones defined in KeySignatures. This is mostly intended for creating custom key signatures.
        Parameters:
        sharps - the Pitch.Base names that should be raised. For example, for G-major this list consists only of Pitch.Base.F.
        flats - the Pitch.Base names that should be flattened. For example, for F-major this list consists only of Pitch.Base.B.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the same Pitch.Base is in both sharps and flats.

    • Method Detail

        public List<Pitch.Base> getFlats()
        Returns:
        a copy of the flats in this KeySignature.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        String representation of KeySignature. String is of form: KeySig(sharps: ...), KeySig(flats: ...), or KeySig(sharps: ... flats: ...) where ... refers to the raised or flatted pitches.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        string representation of KeySignature.

        Compare this to Object o for equality.

        Returns:
